0.question: Greg wants to buy a $90 scooter. He has saved $57 so far. How much more money does Greg need?

1.question: Paul and Vinnie deliver newspapers. Paul made $14 in tips. Vinnie made $16 more than Paul. How much did Vinnie make?

2.question: Chris has 18 soccer cards. His friend, Charlie, has 32 cards. How many fewer cards does Chris have?

3.question: Matthew and Billie went apple picking. Matthew found 46 big, red apples. Billie found some as well. Together they found 80 apples. How many apples did Billie find?

4.question: 35 campers went rowing in the morning. 27 campers went rowing in the afternoon. How many campers went rowing in all?
